lang.show_usage: uchelper lang show - Show current language

platform.show_usage: uchelper platform show - Show current platform

auth.set_usage: uchelper auth <platform> <token> - Set API key for platform
auth.revoke_confirm: Are you sure you want to revoke the API key for {{platform}}?
auth.get_api_key_hint: To obtain API Key, please visit: {{url}}
auth.reload_usage: uchelper auth reload <tool> - Reload configuration to tool
auth.reload_missing_config: Missing platform or API key configuration. Please run 'uchelper auth' first.
auth.reload_tool_not_supported: Tool '{{tool}}' is not supported for reload

wizard.privacy_note: We value your privacy. All configurations are stored locally only.
wizard.input_your_api_key: Please input your API key here, Enter to confirm:
wizard.install_skipped: Installation skipped. You can install manually later.
wizard.action_load_config: Apply Configuration - (Apply the selected platform to {{tool}})
wizard.config_loaded: Configuration loaded successfully, you can now use {{tool}} for coding.
wizard.confirm_unload_config: Are you sure you want to unload platform configuration from {{tool}}?
wizard.tool_not_supported: This operation is not supported for this tool
wizard.missing_config: Missing required configuration (platform or API key)
wizard.no_preset_mcp_installed: No built-in MCP services installed yet
wizard.install_all_mcp_confirm: Are you sure you want to install all built-in MCP services?
wizard.all_mcp_installed: All built-in MCP services installed successfully
wizard.all_mcp_install_failed: Some built-in MCP services failed to install
wizard.global_config_warning: ⚠️  Warning: You are modifying the global configuration. Changes will affect all workspaces.
wizard.api_key_invalid: API Key is invalid or expired
wizard.api_key_network_error: Network error, please check your connection

doctor.api_key_invalid: API Key is invalid or expired
doctor.platform_not_configured: Platform not configured. Run 'uchelper init' to configure.
doctor.git_not_installed: Git is not installed. Please install Git from https://git-scm.com/downloads

messages.first_run: First run detected. Starting initialization wizard...

config.load_failed_hint: Check if the config file exists and is in valid YAML format
config.save_failed_hint: Check file permissions in the config directory. Ensure ~/.uchelper exists.
config.invalid_hint: Please check the configuration file format and values

platform.not_configured_hint: Run 'uchelper init' or 'uchelper platform set <platform>' to configure
platform.api_key_missing: API key not set for platform
platform.api_key_missing_hint: Run 'uchelper auth <platform> <token>' to set your API key
platform.api_key_invalid: API key is invalid or expired
platform.api_key_invalid_hint: Please update your API key with 'uchelper auth <platform> <token>'
platform.endpoint_invalid_hint: Check platform configuration with 'uchelper platform show'
platform.auth_failed_hint: Verify your API key is correct and not expired
platform.request_failed_hint: Check your network connection and try again

tool.not_found_hint: Ensure the tool is installed and available in PATH
tool.install_failed_hint: Check your network connection and tool requirements
tool.execution_failed_hint: Check tool logs for more details

mcp.server_start_failed_hint: Check MCP server logs for more details
mcp.server_stop_failed_hint: Check MCP server configuration and try again
mcp.connection_failed: Failed to connect to MCP server
mcp.connection_failed_hint: Ensure the MCP server is running
mcp.timeout_hint: Check network connection and server status

file.not_found_hint: Check if the file path is correct
file.write_failed_hint: Check file permissions and disk space
file.directory_not_found_hint: Check if the directory path is correct

validation.failed_hint: Please check your input and try again

internal.error_hint: Please try again. If the problem persists, report this issue.
internal.not_implemented: This feature is not yet implemented
internal.not_implemented_hint: This feature will be available in a future version
internal.unexpected_state_hint: Please try again. If the problem persists, report this issue.

network.timeout_hint: Check your connection and try again
